title: Smart Data Models - WindTurbineType3or4Dynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Parent class supporting relationships to wind turbines Type 3 and 4 and wind plant including their control models.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindTurbineType3or4Dynamics

EnergySource.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Energy Source (current source) with which this wind Type 3 or 4 dynamics model is asoociated. Default: None

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine Type 3 or 4 models using this remote input signal. Default: None

WindPlantDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The wind plant with which the wind turbines type 3 or 4 are associated. Default: None
